title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 185.2 - Production
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 185.2 - Production

State Regulations
(a) The department
may enter into contracts for the production of migratory bird products and for
services in connection therewith including, but not limited to, printing, manufacturing, distribution, promotion, marketing and sale. (b) The department shall be solely
responsible for selection and means and methods of selection of artists and art
work for migratory bird products. (c) For each year of issue, the department
shall establish the production size for each print edition, Mint stamps, artist
signed Mint stamps and other migratory bird products based on previous sales
history and future sale expectations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
185.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
